plot: A woman has quit her job at a medical insurance company because she realizes that her saving money by denying treatment to a woman resulted in the woman's death. Now she comes to the widower's house to try to somehow make amends.
title: Thanks for Stopping By
plot_es: A woman has quit her job at a medical insurance company because she realizes that her saving money by denying treatment to a woman resulted in the woman's death. Now she comes to the widower's house to try to somehow make amends.
plot_en: A woman has quit her job at a medical insurance company because she realizes that her saving money by denying treatment to a woman resulted in the woman's death. Now she comes to the widower's house to try to somehow make amends.
